questions.question: How do I Sign Up for Hyreads?
questions.answer: The link to the Hyreads platform is found under the menu on Hyblog. You only need an email and a phone number to sign up. We will also need to confirm those two belong to you for security purpose.

questions.question: How Do I Subscribe to Hyblog posts notifications?
questions.answer: The Hyblog Notification feature is still under development and we will launch it soon. Watch this space!!!!
